scripts._build: tsc && sed -i 's/const random_seedable_1 = require("random-seedable");/const random_seedable_1 = import("random-seedable");/' dist/modules/execution.js && sed -i 's|const array_shuffle_1 = __importDefault(require("array-shuffle"));|const array_shuffle_1 = __importDefault(import("array-shuffle"));|' dist/bot.js
